name: Michael G. Scott
text: The staff here is so disrespectful. The food was undercooked. So my aunt went to the place to ask for her money back, and one of the staff spoked to my aunt anyway they pleased. I cannot believe how rude they were. I would recommend this place if you want undercooked pizza and rude staff members.

name: Janis H.P.
text: We recently were at an adult birthday party. The hostess ordered 5 pizzas from Hungry Howie's. They were delivered on time, temperature warm and very tasty.

name: C W
text: I'm 2 weeks late for my honest (promised) review when I had my first Hungry Howie's experience in Ocala since moving here. Prefessional, courteous staff 5-star earned hands down with me on customer service alone; especially with Melanie. …More

text: The pizza is amazing, especially the original Margherita pizza. Just thinking about it makes my mouth water.

text: Got a free pizza because order was wrong on previous order. The free pizza was made incorrectly and when I took it back in the girl made a mess with it. Don't even want to eat it but tired of dealing with this place and their careless employees. NEVER coming back!

name: Colby
text: I ordered delivery and purchased a large cheese and large Hawaiian (Maui) pizzas. The deal also came with breadsticks and the total was $35 with tip. The price is fine but the pizzas just look like garbage. Disappointing.
